channel.title: NPC Chat Errors [REP++]

item.title: NPC Chat Errors [REP++]
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

EDIT: Fixed. I just needed to add a few things like:

public void sendNpcChat3(String s, String s1, String s2, int ChatNpc, String name) { c.getPA().sendFrame200(4894, 591); c.getPA().sendFrame126(name, 4895); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 4896); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 4897); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 4898); c.getPA().sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 4894); c.getPA().sendFrame164(4893); }
I was missing that.
Thanks to the people who were trying to figure this out

Read full topic
